reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, lightweight, and comfortable, with good quality and color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fall transition piece!
items.body: This sweater is really thin, but not in a bad way. I would not consider it to be a sweater, I would consider it to be more like the thinness of a flannel shirt. It is the perfect fall transition sweater, for those hayrides and pumpkin picking. I love mine with jeans, and the texture of the sweater is ribbed but super soft. It is a great fall wardrobe staple for anyone. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but lightweight fabric.
items.body: Size runs big. Style is great, but fabric is lightweight. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful sweater
items.body: Love it! it fits perfectly and is very comfortable Read more
items.author: nancy c.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft sweater
items.body: The material is light so perfect for early spring and fall. Very comfortable and a great length. Read more
items.author: Soozan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, not a warm sweater. Fits fine; construction is OK.
items.body: Quality is OK but thin knit fabric. Not a warm sweater, just a lightweight cover with hood. Also, color is not green but a grayish heather. I'll keep it for layering under a jacket or coat since the fit is OK. . Read more
items.author: Connecticut Laurel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars nice
items.body: Runs a little big. But i do love to throw it on after work with my loungewear. Or in my cold office at work. Read more
items.author: Jenifer Segal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfy great Sweater!
items.body: I love this! I wear it all the time at work. It's my office sweater! It is soft, and comfy, and just right to take the chill off when I'm working! It isn't too thick, it's just the right length to go to my hips, and it looks nice so it's suitable for the office when I need to greet clients, or if I need to grab it to go out to dinner! I love the color, it's a rich fall color! Read more
items.author: Rie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for winter
items.body: Not as heavy as I thought it would be, Size fit, color great, Read more
items.author: Billie Willis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Blue, Apricot, Black, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
